name: Clefairy
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Metronome
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of the Defending Pokémon’s attacks. Metronome copies that attack except for its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack, such as discarding Energy cards. (No matter what type the Defending Pokémon is, Clefairy’s type is still Colorless.)
